data.name: ACL Pro Cornhole
data.detailed_description:
Play against top ACL pros in the most realistic Cornhole game ever created!

Features
  • Play single player against 32 of the top ACL pros digitized and mocapped with their real-life skills and strategy in a Quick Play matches.
  • Play Single Player Tournament Mode to win the virtual ACL World Championship in our 3D modeled Rock Hill Sports and Events Center.
  • Listen to expert commentary by Trey Ryder and Bernie Nabors critiquing and complimenting your shots and strategy.
  • Compete against equally skilled players around the world in Online Tournaments with custom lobbies.
  • Play one-on-one or two-on-two matches against friends playing together in your own living room.
  • Challenge your friends online across all platforms.
  • Increase your skills (slide, airmail, roll, and push) as you level up earning points by making great shots and winning matches.
  • Play two-on-two matches against friends and other players online.
  • Stat tracking that includes online winning percentages and shot success.
  • Play as your favorite pro. Unlocking new pros to play as you progress through the game leveling up.
  • Try the latest bags from 9 different bag manufacturers with accurately modeled speed rating on both sides.

data.short_description: Play against top ACL pros in the most realistic Cornhole game ever created!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 2500K or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
